title: Poster, 1972
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted in white lower right: Keil, Germany  Photo by Peter Cornelius 07.70.02/9
Imprinted in white lower left: Blat 9 / der Ausstellungsserie / herausgegeben vom / Organisationskomitee / fürdie Spiele / der XX Olympiade / München 1972 [Munich Olympics logo]
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Color photographic reproduction of two tall ships under full sail. Large ship at right fills the sheet with smaller ship in the middle distance at left. Accompaning sailboats at lower left, right and center. Texture of the image is grainy.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, 1972.
1972. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-158.
